about_the_game:
Cowboys and Zombies... What can go wrong?

Prove that you are the fastest gunslinger in the old west by literally shooting with your bare hands. You have to be quick or the zombies will eat you...

The game has two modes: Story mode and Hands tracking or Time mode.
In the story mode the player can move freely around the stage, he will have to find the way to go to the next level.

In hands tracking mode, the player remains static in one position, having to survive the zombie attack for a certain amount of time. You can use the Quest, Quest 2 and Quest Pro goal cameras, to play, you do not need controllers. Playing without controllers is less accurate, but can be more fun...

Designed for Pico 4, Oculus Meta Quest 2, Valve Index, Pimax, HTC Vive and Quest Pro PC-VR, Hands Tracking Mode.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game is a zombie shooter... There are blood splatter shots, red blood. There are beatings and shooting at the zombies. The zombies are killed by shots and blows, although the zombies were already dead...

includes violent scenes with shooting zombies, bloodstains. shots with blood

detailed_description:
Cowboys and Zombies... What can go wrong?

Prove that you are the fastest gunslinger in the old west by literally shooting with your bare hands. You have to be quick or the zombies will eat you...

The game has two modes: Story mode and Hands tracking or Time mode.
In the story mode the player can move freely around the stage, he will have to find the way to go to the next level.

In hands tracking mode, the player remains static in one position, having to survive the zombie attack for a certain amount of time. You can use the Quest, Quest 2 and Quest Pro goal cameras, to play, you do not need controllers. Playing without controllers is less accurate, but can be more fun...

Designed for Pico 4, Oculus Meta Quest 2, Valve Index, Pimax, HTC Vive and Quest Pro PC-VR, Hands Tracking Mode.
name: Cowboys & Zombies VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: i3, i5, i7, i9
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB / AMD 580 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR, Oculus PC, or OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10, 11
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060 6GB / AMD RX 6600
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • VR Support: Valve Indes, Oculus Rift, Windows mixed reality, HTC Vive, Meta Quest, Quest 2, Quest Pro, Pico 3, Pico 4, Pimax

short_description: Designed for Pico 4, Oculus Meta Quest 2, Valve, Pimax, HTC and Quest Pro PC-VR, Hands Tracking Mode. Cowboys and Zombies... What can go wrong? Prove that you are the fastest gunslinger in the old west by literally shooting with your bare hands. You have to be quick or the zombies will eat you...
